```{r}
library(leaps)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(MASS)
library(rstudioapi)
library(car)
library(here)
library(glmnet)
```


```{r}
script_dir <- dirname(getActiveDocumentContext()$path)
setwd(script_dir)
df <- read.table(
  here("abalone", "abalone.data"),
  header = FALSE,
  sep = ",",
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

colnames(df) <- c(
  "Sex", "Length", "Diameter", "Height",
  "WholeWeight", "ShuckedWeight", "VisceraWeight", "ShellWeight",
  "Rings"
)
```
